00033 //----------------------------------------------------------
00034 void
00035 SPolygonVertex::NormalizeComponents( unsigned int componentFlags )
00036 {
00037         if ( componentFlags & GrPolygon::kNormal )
00038                 normal.NormalizeFast();
00039 
00040         if ( componentFlags & GrPolygon::kTangent )
00041                 tangent.NormalizeFast();
00042 
00043         if ( componentFlags & GrPolygon::kBiNormal )
00044                 binormal.NormalizeFast();
00045 }
00046 
00047 //----------------------------------------------------------
00048 SPolygonVertex
00049 SPolygonVertex::operator + ( const SPolygonVertex& vertex )
00050 {
00051         SPolygonVertex newVertex;
00052         newVertex.position = position + vertex.position;
00053         newVertex.normal = normal + vertex.normal;
00054         newVertex.binormal = binormal + vertex.binormal;
00055         newVertex.tangent = tangent + vertex.tangent;
00056         newVertex.color[ 0 ] = color[ 0 ] + vertex.color[ 0 ];
00057         newVertex.color[ 1 ] = color[ 1 ] + vertex.color[ 1 ];
00058         newVertex.color[ 2 ] = color[ 2 ] + vertex.color[ 2 ];
00059         newVertex.color[ 3 ] = color[ 3 ] + vertex.color[ 3 ];
00060         newVertex.uv = uv + vertex.uv;
00061         return newVertex;
00062 }
00063 
00064 //----------------------------------------------------------
00065 SPolygonVertex
00066 operator * ( float scalar, const SPolygonVertex& vertex )
00067 {
00068         SPolygonVertex newVertex;
00069         newVertex.position = scalar * vertex.position;
00070         newVertex.normal = scalar * vertex.normal;
00071         newVertex.binormal = scalar * vertex.binormal;
00072         newVertex.tangent = scalar * vertex.tangent;
00073         newVertex.color[ 0 ] = ( unsigned char )( scalar * vertex.color[ 0 ] );
00074         newVertex.color[ 1 ] = ( unsigned char )( scalar * vertex.color[ 1 ] );
00075         newVertex.color[ 2 ] = ( unsigned char )( scalar * vertex.color[ 2 ] );
00076         newVertex.color[ 3 ] = ( unsigned char )( scalar * vertex.color[ 3 ] );
00077         newVertex.uv = scalar * vertex.uv;
00078         return newVertex;
00079 }

00151 GrPolygon::GrPolygon( unsigned int flags, const SPolygonVertex& v0, const SPolygonVertex& v1, const SPolygonVertex& v2, GrMaterial* material )
00152 : _material( material )
00153 , _flags( flags )
00154 , _userFlags( 0 )
00155 , _userData( 0 )
00156 , _skinned( false )
00157 {
00158         AddVertex( v0 );
00159         AddVertex( v1 );
00160         AddVertex( v2 );
00161 
00162         SVec3 normal = ( v0.position - v1.position ).Cross( v2.position - v1.position );
00163         _plane = MPlane( normal, v0.position );
00164 //      CalcBox();
00165 }

00204 //----------------------------------------------------------
00205 void
00206 GrPolygon::SetSkinningInfo( SPolygonSkinVertex* skinVertArray )
00207 {
00208         _skinned = true;
00209         _skinVertArray.Clear();
00210         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _vertices.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00211                 _skinVertArray.Push( skinVertArray[ i ] );
00212 }

00214 //----------------------------------------------------------
00215 void
00216 GrPolygon::RemapBoneIndices( unsigned int* indices )
00217 {
00218         B_ASSERT( _skinned && indices != 0 );
00219 
00221         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _vertices.GetElemCount(); ++i )
00222         {
00223                 unsigned int oldIndices = _skinVertArray[ i ].boneIds;
00224                 unsigned int newIndices = 0;
00225                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < 3; ++j )
00226                 {
00227                         unsigned int idx = oldIndices >> ( j*8 ) & 0xFF;
00228                         newIndices |= indices[ idx ] << ( j*8 );
00229                 }
00230                 _skinVertArray[ i ].boneIds = newIndices;
00231         }
00232 }

00262 //----------------------------------------------------------
00263 void
00264 GrPolygon::Triangulate( SPolygonTriangle* triangles, SPolygonTriangleSkin* triangleSkinArray ) const
00265 {
00267         unsigned int triangle = 0;
00268         unsigned int vertexCount = GetVertexCount();
00269         for ( unsigned int i = 2; i < vertexCount; ++i, ++triangle )
00270         {
00271                 triangles[ triangle ].v0 = _vertices[ 0 ];
00272                 triangles[ triangle ].v1 = _vertices[ i - 1 ];
00273                 triangles[ triangle ].v2 = _vertices[ i ];
00274         }
00275 
00276         if ( _skinned && triangleSkinArray )
00277         {
00279                 B_ASSERT( _skinVertArray.GetElemCount() == _vertices.GetElemCount() );
00280                 triangle = 0;
00281                 for ( unsigned int i = 2; i < vertexCount; ++i, ++triangle )
00282                 {
00283                         triangleSkinArray[ triangle ].s0 = _skinVertArray[ 0 ];
00284                         triangleSkinArray[ triangle ].s1 = _skinVertArray[ i - 1 ];
00285                         triangleSkinArray[ triangle ].s2 = _skinVertArray[ i ];
00286                 }
00287         }
00288 }

00290 //----------------------------------------------------------
00291 void
00292 GrPolygon::Triangulate( SPolygonVertex* triangleList ) const
00293 {
00295         unsigned int vertex = 0;
00296         unsigned int vertexCount = GetVertexCount();
00297         for ( unsigned int i = 2; i < vertexCount; ++i, vertex += 3 )
00298         {
00299                 triangleList[ vertex+0 ] = _vertices[ 0 ];
00300                 triangleList[ vertex+1 ] = _vertices[ i - 1 ];
00301                 triangleList[ vertex+2 ] = _vertices[ i ];
00302         }
00303 }

00305 //----------------------------------------------------------
00306 bool
00307 GrPolygon::Intersect( SRayIntersectInfo& info, const SVec3& rayStart, const SVec3& rayDir, float maxDist ) const
00308 {
00310         SVec3 faceNormal( GetNormal() );
00311         float d = rayDir.Dot( faceNormal );
00312 
00315         if ( d >= 0.0001f )
00316         {
00317 //              d = -d;
00318 //              faceNormal = -faceNormal;
00319                 return false;
00320         }
00321 
00323         const SVec3& pt0 = _vertices[ 0 ].position;
00324 
00326         SVec3 vec = rayStart - pt0;
00327         float distance = -vec.Dot( faceNormal ) / d;
00328 //      if ( distance < 0.01f || distance > maxDist )
00329 //              return false;
00330         if ( distance < 0.0f || distance > maxDist )
00331                 return false;
00332 
00334         SVec3 point = rayStart + distance * rayDir;
00335         SVec3 p = point - pt0;
00336 
00339         float maxAxis = faceNormal.AbsMax();
00340         int domAxis = 0;
00341 
00345         for ( ; domAxis < 2; ++domAxis )
00346         {
00347                 if ( Abs( maxAxis - Abs( faceNormal[ domAxis ] ) ) < 0.0001f )
00348                         break;
00349         }
00350 
00352         unsigned int a0 = ( domAxis == 0 ) ? 1 : 0;
00353         unsigned int a1 = ( domAxis <= 1 ) ? 2 : 1;
00354 //      a0 = domAxis == 0 ? 1 : 0
00355 //      if ( domAxis == 0 )
00356 //      {
00357 //              a0 = 1;
00358 //              a1 = 2;
00359 //      }
00360 //      else if ( domAxis == 1 )
00361 //              a1 = 2;
00362 
00364         float u = 0.0f;
00365         float v = 0.0f;
00366         unsigned int i = GetVertexCount();
00367         while ( i-- > 2 )
00368         {
00369                 const SVec3& pt1 = _vertices[ i-1 ].position;
00370                 const SVec3& pt2 = _vertices[ i ].position;
00371 
00373                 SVec3 b = pt1 - pt0;
00374                 SVec3 c = pt2 - pt0;
00375 
00377                 u = ( p[a1]*c[a0] - p[a0]*c[a1] ) / ( b[a1]*c[a0] - b[a0]*c[a1] );
00378                 v = ( p[a1]*b[a0] - p[a0]*b[a1] ) / ( c[a1]*b[a0] - c[a0]*b[a1] );
00379 
00381                 if ( u >= 0.0f && v >= 0.0f && ( u + v ) <= 1.0f )
00382                 {
00383                         info.hitDist = distance;
00384                         info.hitLoc = point;
00385                         info.u = u;
00386                         info.v = v;
00387                         info.triIdx = i - 2;
00388                         return true;
00389                 }
00390         }
00391 
00394         return false;
00395 }
00396 
00397 //----------------------------------------------------------
00398 float
00399 GrPolygon::IntersectFast( const SVec3& rayStart, const SVec3& rayDir, float maxDist ) const
00400 {
00402         const MVec3& faceNormal = GetNormal();
00403         float d = -( rayDir.Dot( faceNormal ) );
00404 
00407 //      if ( d < -0.005f )
00408 //              return -1.0f;
00409 
00411         const SVec3& pt0 = _vertices[ 0 ].position;
00412 
00414         SVec3 vec = rayStart;
00415         vec -= pt0;
00416         float distance = vec.Dot( faceNormal );
00417         if ( d <= 0.0001f || distance < 0.0f || distance > d*maxDist )
00418                 return -1.0f;
00419 
00421         distance /= d;
00422 
00426         vec.x += distance * rayDir.x;
00427         vec.y += distance * rayDir.y;
00428         vec.z += distance * rayDir.z;
00429 //      vec += distance * rayDir;
00430 //      SVec3 p = vec + distance * rayDir;
00431 
00433         float absX = Abs( faceNormal.GetX() );
00434         float absY = Abs( faceNormal.GetY() );
00435         float absZ = Abs( faceNormal.GetZ() );
00436         int a0 = ( absX >= absY ) ? 1 : 0;
00437         int a1 = ( absY >= absZ ) ? 2 : !a0;
00438 
00440         float b[2];
00441         float c[2];
00442         for ( int i = GetVertexCount()-2; i > 0; --i )
00443         {
00444                 const SVec3& pt1 = _vertices[ i+0 ].position;
00445                 const SVec3& pt2 = _vertices[ i+1 ].position;
00446 
00448                 b[0] = pt1[a0] - pt0[a0];
00449                 b[1] = pt1[a1] - pt0[a1];
00450                 c[0] = pt2[a0] - pt0[a0];
00451                 c[1] = pt2[a1] - pt0[a1];
00452 
00454                 float u = ( vec[a1]*c[0] - vec[a0]*c[1] ) / ( b[1]*c[0] - b[0]*c[1] );
00455                 float v = ( vec[a1]*b[0] - vec[a0]*b[1] ) / ( c[1]*b[0] - c[0]*b[1] );
00456 
00458                 if ( u >= 0.0f && v >= 0.0f && ( u + v ) <= 1.0f )
00459                         return distance;
00460         }
00461         
00462 
00465         return -1.0f;
00466 }

00468 //----------------------------------------------------------
00469 GrPolygon::EPLANERELATION
00470 GrPolygon::CalcPlaneRelation( const MPlane& plane, float planeDistEpsilon ) const
00471 {
00473         EPLANERELATION relation = EPR_COPLANAR;
00474         const unsigned int elemCount = _vertices.GetElemCount();
00475         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < elemCount; ++i )
00476         {
00477                 int curSide = plane.GetSide( _vertices[ i ].position, planeDistEpsilon );
00478                 if ( curSide != 0 )
00479                 {
00480                         EPLANERELATION curRelation = ( curSide == 1 ? EPR_FRONT : EPR_BACK );
00481                         if ( relation == EPR_COPLANAR )
00482                                 relation = curRelation;         
00483                         else if ( curRelation != relation )
00484                                 return EPR_SPLIT;                       
00485                 }
00486         }
00487 
00489         return relation;
00490 }

00492 //----------------------------------------------------------
00493 int
00494 GrPolygon::Split( GrPolygon& front, GrPolygon& back, const MPlane& plane, float planeDistEpsilon ) const
00495 {
00497         unsigned int vertexCount = GetVertexCount();
00498 
00500         UFastArray< SPolygonVertex > frontVerts;
00501         UFastArray< SPolygonVertex > backVerts;
00502 
00504         const SPolygonVertex* vertexA = &GetVertex( vertexCount - 1 );
00505 
00507         int sideA = 0;
00508         unsigned int vert = vertexCount;
00509         while ( sideA == 0 && vert-- > 0 )
00510                 sideA = plane.GetSide( GetVertex( vert ).position, planeDistEpsilon );
00511 
00513         if ( sideA == 0 )
00514         {
00516                 if ( GetNormal().Dot( plane.GetNormal() ) >= 0.0f )
00517                 {
00518                         front = *this;
00519                         return 1;
00520                 }
00521                 else
00522                 {
00523                         back = *this;
00524                         return -1;
00525                 }
00526         }
00527 
00529         bool prevOnPlane = ( vert != ( vertexCount-1 ) );
00530         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < vertexCount; ++i )
00531         {
00532                 const SPolygonVertex* vertexB = &GetVertex( i );
00533                 int sideB = plane.GetSide( vertexB->position, planeDistEpsilon );
00534                 if ( sideB > 0 )
00535                 {
00536                         if ( sideA < 0 )
00537                         {
00538                                 if ( !prevOnPlane )
00539                                 {
00540                                         float distA = Abs( plane.Dist( vertexA->position ) );
00541                                         float distB = Abs( plane.Dist( vertexB->position ) );
00542                                         float t = distA / ( distA + distB );
00543                                         frontVerts.Push() = backVerts.Push() = Lerp( *vertexA, *vertexB, t );
00544                                 }
00545                                 else
00546                                         frontVerts.Push() = *vertexA;
00547                         }
00548                         frontVerts.Push( *vertexB );
00549                         prevOnPlane = false;
00550                 }
00551                 else if ( sideB < 0 )
00552                 {
00553                         if ( sideA > 0 )
00554                         {
00555                                 if ( !prevOnPlane )
00556                                 {
00557                                         float distA = Abs( plane.Dist( vertexA->position ) );
00558                                         float distB = Abs( plane.Dist( vertexB->position ) );
00559                                         float t = distA / ( distA + distB );
00560                                         frontVerts.Push() = backVerts.Push() = Lerp( *vertexA, *vertexB, t );
00561                                 }
00562                                 else
00563                                         backVerts.Push() = *vertexA;
00564                         }
00565                         backVerts.Push( *vertexB );
00566                         prevOnPlane = false;
00567                 }
00568                 else
00569                 {
00570                         prevOnPlane = true;
00571                         if ( sideA == -1 )
00572                                 backVerts.Push( *vertexB );
00573                         else
00574                                 frontVerts.Push( *vertexB );
00575                 }
00576 
00578                 vertexA = vertexB;
00579                 if ( sideB != 0 )
00580                         sideA = sideB;
00581         }
00582 
00583         B_ASSERT( frontVerts.GetElemCount() == 0 || frontVerts.GetElemCount() >= 3 );
00584         B_ASSERT( backVerts.GetElemCount() == 0 || backVerts.GetElemCount() >= 3 );
00585         B_ASSERT( frontVerts.GetElemCount() > 0 || backVerts.GetElemCount() > 0 );
00586 
00588         int ret = 0;
00589         if ( frontVerts.GetElemCount() >= 3 )
00590         {
00591                 front.SetVertices( _flags, frontVerts.GetPtr(), frontVerts.GetElemCount(), _material, _plane );
00592                 ret += 1;
00593         }
00594         if ( backVerts.GetElemCount() >= 3 )
00595         {
00596                 back.SetVertices( _flags, backVerts.GetPtr(), backVerts.GetElemCount(), _material, _plane );
00597                 ret -= 1;
00598         }
00599         return ret;
00600 }
00601 
00602 //----------------------------------------------------------
00603 bool
00604 GrPolygon::CheckTJunc( const GrPolygon& polygon, float epsilon )
00605 {
00608         B_ASSERT( !_skinned );
00609 
00612 //      if ( ( polygon._userFlags & EFV_EDGEPOLY ) != 0 || ( _userFlags & EFV_EDGEPOLY ) != 0 )
00613 //              return;
00614 
00616         const float distSqrEpsilon = epsilon * epsilon;
00617 
00618         unsigned int vertexCount = GetVertexCount();
00619         unsigned int polyVertexCount = polygon.GetVertexCount();
00620 
00622         UFastArray< std::map< float, SPolygonVertex > > vertsToAdd;
00623         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < vertexCount; ++i )
00624         {
00625                 std::map< float, SPolygonVertex >& edgeVertsToAdd = vertsToAdd.Push();
00626                 const SPolygonVertex& edgeV0 = _vertices[ i ];
00627                 const SPolygonVertex& edgeV1 = _vertices[ ( i + 1 ) % vertexCount ];
00628                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < polyVertexCount; ++j )
00629                 {
00631                         const SVec3& pos = polygon.GetVertex( j ).position;
00632 
00635                         if ( ( pos.DistSqr( edgeV0.position ) < distSqrEpsilon ) || ( pos.DistSqr( edgeV1.position ) < distSqrEpsilon ) )
00636                                 continue;
00637 
00639                         float t = IsInLine( edgeV0.position, edgeV1.position, pos, epsilon );
00640                         if ( t >= 0.0f )
00641                         {
00644                                 SPolygonVertex& newVert = edgeVertsToAdd[ t ];
00645                                 newVert = Lerp( edgeV0, edgeV1, t );
00646                                 newVert.position = pos;
00647                         }
00648                 }
00649         }
00650 
00652         unsigned int edgeCount = vertsToAdd.GetElemCount();
00653         unsigned int adj = 1;
00654         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < edgeCount; ++i )
00655         {
00656                 std::map< float, SPolygonVertex >& newEdgeVerts = vertsToAdd[ i ];
00657                 std::map< float, SPolygonVertex >::iterator iter = newEdgeVerts.begin();
00658                 std::map< float, SPolygonVertex >::iterator end = newEdgeVerts.end();
00659                 for ( ; iter != end; ++iter, ++adj )
00660                         InsertVertex( i + adj, iter->second );
00661         }
00662 
00664         vertsToAdd.Clear();
00665 
00667         return adj > 0;
00668 }

00670 //----------------------------------------------------------
00671 bool
00672 GrPolygon::IsDegenerate( float epsilon ) const
00673 {
00675         return ( GetArea() <= epsilon );
00676 }
00677 
00678 //----------------------------------------------------------
00679 bool
00680 GrPolygon::RemoveDuplicateVerts( float distEpsilonSqr )
00681 {
00683         int i = 0;
00684         while ( i < ( int )GetVertexCount() )
00685         {
00686                 unsigned int prevVertIdx = ( i - 1 ) < 0 ? ( GetVertexCount() - 1 ) : ( i - 1 );
00687                 SPolygonVertex& prevVert = _vertices[ prevVertIdx ];
00688                 SPolygonVertex& curVert = _vertices[ i ];
00689                 if ( curVert.position.DistSqr( prevVert.position ) < distEpsilonSqr )
00690                 {
00692                         RemoveVertex( i );
00693                         continue;
00694                 }
00695                 ++i;
00696         }
00697 
00699         return ( GetVertexCount() >= 3 );
00700 }
00701 
00702 //----------------------------------------------------------
00703 void
00704 GrPolygon::WeldVertices( const GrPolygon& polygon, float distEpsilonSqr )
00705 {
00707         unsigned int vertexCount = GetVertexCount();
00708         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < vertexCount; ++i )
00709         {
00710                 unsigned int neighborVertexCount = polygon.GetVertexCount();
00711                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < neighborVertexCount; ++j )
00712                 {
00714                         if ( _vertices[ i ].position.DistSqr( polygon.GetVertex( j ).position ) < distEpsilonSqr )
00715                                 _vertices[ i ].position = polygon.GetVertex( j ).position;
00716                 }
00717         }
00718 }
00719 
00720 //----------------------------------------------------------
00721 void
00722 GrPolygon::ReverseWinding()
00723 {
00725         unsigned int vertexCount = GetVertexCount();
00726         SPolygonVertex* newVerts = ( SPolygonVertex* )alloca( vertexCount * sizeof( SPolygonVertex ) );
00727         for ( unsigned int i = 0, r = vertexCount-1; i < vertexCount; ++i, --r )
00728                 newVerts[ r ] = _vertices[ i ];
00729 
00731         SetVertices( _flags, newVerts, vertexCount, _material );
00732 }
00733 
00734 //----------------------------------------------------------
00735 bool
00736 GrPolygon::IsEdgePolygon( const MPlane& plane, float planeDistEpsilon ) const
00737 {
00741         unsigned int vertexCount = GetVertexCount();
00742         unsigned int edgeVertexCount = 0;
00743         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < vertexCount; ++i )
00744         {
00747                 if ( !plane.GetSide( _vertices[ i ].position, planeDistEpsilon ) )
00748                         if ( ++edgeVertexCount == 2 )
00749                                 return true;
00750         }
00751         return false;
00752 }
00753 
00754 //----------------------------------------------------------
00755 bool
00756 GrPolygon::IsCoplanar( const MPlane& plane, float epsilon ) const
00757 {
00759         if ( plane.GetNormal().Dot( _plane.GetNormal() ) < 0.7f )
00760                 return false;
00761 
00763         unsigned int vertexCount = GetVertexCount();
00764         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < vertexCount; ++i )
00765         {
00766                 if ( plane.GetSide( _vertices[ i ].position, epsilon ) != 0 )
00767                         return false;
00768         }
00769 
00771         return true;
00772 }
00773 
00774 //----------------------------------------------------------
00775 bool
00776 GrPolygon::IsNeighbor( const GrPolygon& polygon, float epsilon ) const
00777 {
00781 
00783         unsigned int edgeCount = _vertices.GetElemCount();
00784         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < edgeCount; ++i )
00785         {
00786                 MVec3 vertA = _vertices[ i ].position;
00787                 MVec3 vertB = _vertices[ (i+1) % edgeCount ].position;
00788 
00790                 unsigned int polyEdgeCount = polygon._vertices.GetElemCount();
00791                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < polyEdgeCount; ++j )
00792                 {
00795                         MVec3 polyVertA = polygon._vertices[ j ].position;
00796                         MVec3 polyVertB = polygon._vertices[ (j+1) % polyEdgeCount ].position;
00797                         if ( ( vertA - polyVertB ).AbsMax() < epsilon &&
00798                                  ( vertB - polyVertA ).AbsMax() < epsilon )
00799                                 return true;
00800                 }
00801         }
00802 
00804         return false;
00805 }
00806 
00807 //----------------------------------------------------------
00808 GrPolygon
00809 GrPolygon::Transform( const MMat4x4& transform, const MMat3x3& normalRot ) const
00810 {
00811         GrPolygon newPoly = *this;
00812         newPoly.TransformFast( transform, normalRot );
00813         return newPoly;
00814 }
00815 
00816 //----------------------------------------------------------
00817 void
00818 GrPolygon::TransformFast( const MMat4x4& transform, const MMat3x3& normalRot )
00819 {
00821         unsigned int vertexCount = _vertices.GetElemCount();
00822         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < vertexCount; ++i )
00823         {
00824                 MVec3 pos = _vertices[ i ].position;
00825                 MVec3 norm = _vertices[ i ].normal;
00826                 MVec3 tan = _vertices[ i ].tangent;
00827                 MVec3 binorm = _vertices[ i ].binormal;
00828 
00829                 B_ASSERT( norm.MagSqr() > 0.0001f );
00830                 B_ASSERT( tan.MagSqr() > 0.0001f );
00831                 B_ASSERT( binorm.MagSqr() > 0.0001f );
00832 
00833                 transform.TransformCoordFast( pos );
00834                 normalRot.RotatePointFast( norm );
00835                 normalRot.RotatePointFast( tan );
00836                 normalRot.RotatePointFast( binorm );
00837 
00838                 _vertices[ i ].position = pos;
00839                 if ( norm.MagSqr() > 0.001f )
00840                         _vertices[ i ].normal = norm.Normalized();
00841                 else
00842                         _vertices[ i ].normal = norm;
00843                 _vertices[ i ].tangent = tan.Normalized();
00844                 _vertices[ i ].binormal = binorm.Normalized();
00845 
00846                 B_ASSERT( norm.MagSqr() > 0.0001f );
00847                 B_ASSERT( tan.MagSqr() > 0.0001f );
00848                 B_ASSERT( binorm.MagSqr() > 0.0001f );
00849         }
00850 
00852         _plane.TransformFast( transform, normalRot );
00853 }
00854 
00855 //----------------------------------------------------------
00856 float
00857 GrPolygon::GetArea() const
00858 {
00860         float area = 0.0f;
00861         unsigned int vertexCount = GetVertexCount();
00862         for ( unsigned int i = 2; i < vertexCount; ++i )
00863         {
00865                 MVec3 edge0 = _vertices[ i - 1 ].position - _vertices[ i - 2 ].position;
00866                 MVec3 edge1 = _vertices[ i - 0 ].position - _vertices[ i - 2 ].position;
00867 
00870                 if ( edge0.MagSqr() <= 0.0001f || edge1.MagSqr() <= 0.0001f )
00871                         continue;
00872 
00874                 float sinTheta = edge0.Normalized().Cross( edge1.Normalized() ).Mag();
00875                 area += 0.5f * Abs( sinTheta ) * edge0.Mag() * edge1.Mag();
00876         }
00877 
00879         return area;
00880 }

00882 //----------------------------------------------------------
00883 GrPolygon&
00884 GrPolygon::operator = ( const GrPolygon& polygon )
00885 {
00886         _vertices = polygon._vertices;
00887         _skinVertArray = polygon._skinVertArray;
00888         _material = polygon._material;
00889         _plane = polygon._plane;
00890         _flags = polygon._flags;
00891         _userFlags = polygon._userFlags;
00892         _userData = polygon._userData;
00893         _skinned = polygon._skinned;
00894         return *this;
00895 }
00896 
00897 //----------------------------------------------------------
00898 void
00899 GrPolygon::Save( UWriter& writer ) const
00900 {
00902         writer.WriteUInt( _flags );
00903 
00905         const unsigned int vertexCount = _vertices.GetElemCount();
00906         writer.WriteUInt( vertexCount );
00907         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < vertexCount; ++i )
00908         {
00909                 writer.WriteBytes( &_vertices[ i ].position, sizeof( SVec3 ) );
00910                 if ( _flags & kNormal )
00911                         writer.WriteBytes( &_vertices[ i ].normal, sizeof( SVec3 ) );
00912                 if ( _flags & kTangent )
00913                         writer.WriteBytes( &_vertices[ i ].tangent, sizeof( SVec3 ) );
00914                 if ( _flags & kBiNormal )
00915                         writer.WriteBytes( &_vertices[ i ].binormal, sizeof( SVec3 ) );
00916                 if ( _flags & kColor )
00917                         writer.WriteBytes( &_vertices[ i ].color, sizeof( unsigned long ) );
00918                 if ( _flags & kUV )
00919                         writer.WriteBytes( &_vertices[ i ].uv, sizeof( SVec2 ) );
00920         }
00921 
00923         const unsigned int skinVertexCount = _skinVertArray.GetElemCount();
00924         writer.WriteUInt( skinVertexCount );
00925         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < skinVertexCount; ++i )
00926         {
00927                 writer.WriteBytes( &_skinVertArray[ i ], sizeof( SPolygonSkinVertex ) );
00928         }
00929 
00931         if ( _material != 0 )
00932                 writer.WriteString( _material->GetName() );
00933         else
00934                 writer.WriteString( "" );
00935 
00937         _plane.Save( writer );
00938 
00940         writer.WriteUInt( _userFlags );
00941 
00943         writer.WriteUInt( _skinned ? 1 : 0 );
00944 }
00945 
00946 //----------------------------------------------------------
00947 void
00948 GrPolygon::Load( UReader& reader )
00949 {
00950         _vertices.Clear();
00951         _skinVertArray.Clear();
00952 
00954         _flags = reader.ReadUInt();
00955 
00957         const unsigned int vertexCount = reader.ReadUInt();
00958         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < vertexCount; ++i )
00959         {
00960                 SPolygonVertex& vertex = _vertices.Push();
00961                 reader.ReadBytes( &vertex.position, sizeof( SVec3 ) );
00962                 if ( _flags & kNormal )
00963                         reader.ReadBytes( &vertex.normal, sizeof( SVec3 ) );
00964                 if ( _flags & kTangent )
00965                         reader.ReadBytes( &vertex.tangent, sizeof( SVec3 ) );
00966                 if ( _flags & kBiNormal )
00967                         reader.ReadBytes( &vertex.binormal, sizeof( SVec3 ) );
00968                 if ( _flags & kColor )
00969                         reader.ReadBytes( &vertex.color, sizeof( unsigned long ) );
00970                 if ( _flags & kUV )
00971                         reader.ReadBytes( &vertex.uv, sizeof( SVec2 ) );
00972         }
00973 
00975         const unsigned int skinVertexCount = reader.ReadUInt();
00976         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < skinVertexCount; ++i )
00977         {
00978                 reader.ReadBytes( &_skinVertArray.Push(), sizeof( SPolygonSkinVertex ) );
00979         }
00980 
00982         tstring materialName = reader.ReadString();
00983         if ( materialName.length() > 0 )
00984         {
00985                 tstring error;
00986                 _material = gGrMaterialMgr->GetMaterial( materialName, error );
00987         }
00988         else
00989                 _material = 0;
00990 
00992         _plane.Load( reader );
00993 
00995         _userFlags = reader.ReadUInt();
00996 
00998         _skinned = ( reader.ReadUInt() == 1 );
00999 }

01006 //----------------------------------------------------------
01007 void
01008 GrPolygon::Init( const SPolygonVertex* verts, unsigned int vertexCount )
01009 {
01011         _vertices.Clear();
01012 
01014         B_ASSERT( verts != 0 );
01015 
01017         B_ASSERT( vertexCount >= 3 );
01018 
01019         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < vertexCount; ++i )
01020                 _vertices.Push( verts[ i ] );
01021 }
01022 
01023 //----------------------------------------------------------
01024 void
01025 GrPolygon::CalcPlane()
01026 {
01027 /*  -- This "virtual plane" crap is all but useless.
01029         MVec3 normal = SVec3( 0, 0, 0 );
01030         MVec3 position = SVec3( 0, 0, 0 );
01031 
01033         unsigned int vertexCount = GetVertexCount();
01034         float w = 1.0f / float( vertexCount );
01035         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < vertexCount; ++i )
01036         {
01037                 normal += w * _vertices[ i ].normal;
01038                 position += w * _vertices[ i ].position;
01039         }
01040 */
01041 #if 0
01043         unsigned int vertexCount = GetVertexCount();
01044 
01045         unsigned int v0 = 0;
01046         unsigned int v1 = ( vertexCount * 2 / 3 ) - 1;
01047         unsigned int v2 = vertexCount - 1;
01048 
01049         MVec3 edge0 = _vertices[ v2 ].position - _vertices[ v1 ].position;
01050         MVec3 edge1 = _vertices[ v2 ].position - _vertices[ v0 ].position;
01051 
01052         MVec3 normal = edge1.Cross( edge0 );
01053         if ( normal.MagSqr() > 0.0001f )
01054         {
01055                 _plane = MPlane( normal, _vertices[ v0 ].position );
01056                 if ( IsCoplanar( _plane, 1.0f ) )
01057                         return;
01058         }
01059 
01061         _plane = MPlane( MVec3( 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f ), _vertices[ 0 ].position );
01062 #else
01064         unsigned int vertexCount = GetVertexCount();
01065         for ( unsigned int i = 2; i < vertexCount; ++i )
01066         {
01068                 MVec3 edge0 = _vertices[ i ].position - _vertices[ i-1 ].position;
01069                 MVec3 edge1 = _vertices[ i ].position - _vertices[ i-2 ].position;
01070                 if ( edge0.MagSqr() <= 0.0001f || edge1.MagSqr() <= 0.0001f )
01071                         continue;
01072 
01073                 MVec3 normal = edge1.Normalized().Cross( edge0.Normalized() );
01074                 if ( normal.MagSqr() > 0.0001f )
01075                 {
01076                         _plane = MPlane( normal, _vertices[ i ].position );
01077                         return;
01078                 }
01079         }
01080 
01083         B_ASSERT( _flags & kNormal );
01084         MVec3 normal( 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f );
01085         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < vertexCount; ++i )
01086         {
01087                 normal += GetVertex( i ).normal;
01088         }
01089 
01091         if ( normal.MagSqr() < 0.00001f )
01092                 normal.SetY( 1.0f );
01093         else
01094                 normal.Normalize();
01095 
01097         _plane = MPlane( normal, GetVertex( 0 ).position );
01098 #endif
01099 }

01101 //----------------------------------------------------------
01102 void
01103 GrPolygon::AddVertex( const SPolygonVertex& vertex )
01104 {
01109         B_ASSERT( !_skinned );
01110 
01112         _vertices.Push( vertex );
01113 }

01115 //----------------------------------------------------------
01116 void
01117 GrPolygon::InsertVertex( unsigned int pos, const SPolygonVertex& vertex )
01118 {
01123         B_ASSERT( !_skinned );
01124 
01126         _vertices.Insert( pos, vertex );
01127 }
01128 
01129 //----------------------------------------------------------
01130 void
01131 GrPolygon::RemoveVertex( unsigned int index )
01132 {
01133         _vertices.Erase( index );
01134         if ( _skinned )
01135         {
01137                 B_ASSERT( _skinVertArray.GetElemCount() == _vertices.GetElemCount() );
01138                 _skinVertArray.Erase( index );
01139         }
01140 }

01143 //==========================================================
01145 //==========================================================
01146 
01147 //----------------------------------------------------------
01148 float
01149 IsInLine( const SVec3& pt0, const SVec3& pt1, const SVec3& testPt, float epsilon )
01150 {
01152         MVec3 hyp = testPt - pt0;
01153         MVec3 vec = pt1 - pt0;
01154 
01156         float invLen = 1.0f / vec.Mag();
01157         MVec3 dir = invLen * vec;
01158 
01160         float t = invLen * dir.Dot( hyp );
01161 
01165         if ( t < 0.0f || t > 1.0f )
01166                 return -1.0f;
01167 
01169         if ( hyp.DistSqr( t * vec ) < epsilon )
01170                 return t;
01171 
01173         return -1.0f;
01174 }
